# Kumbh Mela Crowd Management System

## Project Overview
Full-stack crowd management system for Kumbh Mela with React frontend and Node.js backend.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Leaflet.js, Chart.js
- Backend: Node.js, Express, WebSockets, Socket.io
- ML Integration: YOLO model integration for crowd detection
- Maps: Leaflet.js with OpenStreetMap
- Real-time: Socket.io for live updates
